title: Shutout
description: ****COMING SOON****AUGUST 12th (Pre-Order Available)Love can be the best trophy and the sweetest consolation prize.ShutoutBook 5 in the Renegades Series.Hockey Happily Ever Afters with Spice on Ice.Shutout is the story of Dominic Zanetti (Renegades goalie) and Hailee Valentine.Dom is flirty, swoon-worthy and tattooed. He's only ever truly loved one woman, Hailee. But that ended long ago. He still compares every puck bunny to her but no one measures up.Hailee is stubborn, tattooed, and not the kind of woman to let a man take care of her. She refuses to sit in the kitchen and bake pies for anyone. Hailee is her own woman and plans to stay that way. That's why she had to leave Dominic all those years ago. When all things in her life finally start to fall neatly into place, one thing is still missing. Dominic.
author: Melody Heck Gatto
